metadata.title: CVE-2021-47445 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm: Fix null pointer dereference on pointer edp The initialization ofpointer dev dereferences pointer edp before edp is null checked, so thereis a potential null pointer deference issue. Fix this by only dereferencingedp after edp has been null checked. Addresses-Coverity: ("Dereferencebefore null check")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
